examples: The program committee acknowledged the submission of the authors of the paper

results.definition: accept (someone) to be what is claimed or accept his power and authority
examples: The Crown Prince was acknowledged as the true heir to the throne

results.definition: express recognition of the presence or existence of, or acquaintance with
examples: He never acknowledges his colleagues when they run into him in the hallway
She acknowledged his complement with a smile
it is important to acknowledge the work of others in one's own writing

results.definition: declare to be true or admit the existence or reality or truth of
examples: She acknowledged that she might have forgotten

results.definition: express obligation, thanks, or gratitude for
examples: We must acknowledge the kindness she showed towards us

results.definition: accept as legally binding and valid
